name: Lucky Property Development Invest
description: LPDi invests in real estate projects and golf courses with profitable growth of more than 300%/year. Investors will have chances to participate in high liquidity and guaranteed profit investment, even with small capital. Moreover, investors will receive the privilege to use products and services of the LPDi ecosystem, including the real invested estate chains, the CitiGolf ecosystem, the F&B restaurant systems, and other services.
